article:
4G Labs (www.4g-labs.com) thank you for installing and using our app. May Goddess Krishnamma bless you with wealth, health and prosperity.

Hope you like our app. Please provide your reviews and comments to help us improve further. Visit our website to browse more interesting apps by us that will help you with your daily routines

header: PV Sindhu to be the special guest
article: PV Sindhu, the golden girl of India who won the silver medal in Womens Badminton at Rio Olympics, will be the special guest at the Krishnamma Harathi ritual during the closing ceremony of Krishna Pushkaralu
